chicken police is a film noir that does not take itself serious the wonderful twist is that all the characters are animals this adds a refreshing layer of irony on their sterotypic behaviour on top of that the story is interesting the dialogues are witty and the relationship between sonny and marty shows development the game is easy so far and can be played in sittings of half an hour now and then

this is less of a game and more of a visual novel  with that being said it is way more fun than it has any right to be  the characters are fun and engaging and interesting  and the voice overs are superb in short i recommend chicken police to anyone who really enjoys a narrative heavy story based visual novel

there is no shortage of animal themed oddball detective games but chicken police is definitively the king of the sub genre jungle the unusual combination of film noire and animal realism never feels like a superficial facade and consistently adds to the story being told there is no shortage of brilliantly written and fully voice acted dialog while the story takes some really memorable turns i definitely recommend seeking this game out if you get the chance

basically a noir visual detective novel the execution is wonderful lots of well written dialogue all of it fully voiced by excellent vas the setting is unique and yet has so many references to popular noir culture

this was a shockingly great noir detective story the tone humor and visuals are on point and the fantastic worldbuilding the creators have set up fits neatly into place in the setting without taking away from the story there is a lot of fantastic fullvoiced dialogue throughout with far more side topics and conversations than i would have thought   im a big fan and i now eagerly look forward to other games the developers have in the works for this setting
